CustomField.label: XML Path
CustomField.description: Path to extract value from XML. Use dot notation for nested elements (e.g., "fullName", "criteriaItems.field"). Special values: $OBJECT_NAME (from filename), $FILE_PATH
CustomField.inlineHelpText: XML element to extract. Use $OBJECT_NAME for filename-derived object, $FILE_PATH for full path. Use dot notation for nested elements.
